conversations.content: Please note that this story contains spoilers for chapter 11 of the main campaign.
Hee hee! Success! Now to find Master Xuan Zang somewhere in this castle...
Unknown individual detected. Possibility of intruder: High.
Good heavens! It moves and talks!
Are you powered by clockwork? Perhaps a series of water channels and gates? Oh, I simply MUST learn your secrets!
I am not certain what you desire, but your proposal is refused.
Perhaps I'll glean this bio-form's secrets if I disassemble it! Ah, but I'm a genius. Now where did I put that screwdriver...?
Disassembling? This will likely result in my ultimate destruction.
Target confirmed as hostile. Interceptor program activated.
▷Laxi, wait! You don't have to—◁ Overruled. Eliminating hostile.
Blargh! ...H-heavens, what a blow! Almost...like a master...
Hey, boss? Don't wanna bug ya, but one'a Xuan Zang's buddies was collapsed over in the courtyard.
Ooooohhh...
You're Sha Wujing, yes?
Oh! Hello, Your Highness! My, but it has been quite a while. It was SUCH a pleasure making your acquaintance during the whole Mei Hou Wang incident.
Well, after that unpleasantness was over, I determined that Master Xuan Zang was staying here and came to see her.
Okay, I get all that. The part I'm confused about is where you were lying in a heap on the ground while moaning in pain.
WAS I doing that? My word! I fear my memory gets a bit fuzzy just after I secreted into your castle here.
Yes, well, I'm clearly standing now, so let us leave the past in the past. Now then, please take me to Xuan Zang!
Xuan Zang isn't here right now.
She found another dangerous relic and went out to seal it.
She DID?! When?! Where?! Why?! And what sort of relic?!
Ack! I don't know!
A mystery relic, eh? HmmmmMMMMM... Well, it will be no easy thing to track her down if that is her goal.
I suppose there is nothing to do but wait in this lovely castle for her return.
Well, we'd be happy to have you. Take any empty room you like.
I deeply appreciate your kindness, sir! It may be presumptuous of me to offer thanks, but I would be thrilled to apply my prodigious talents to your cause!
I have much experience from my days in Taiwu as a tactician, public servant, and technician.
I can be of service not only in battle, but in running the castle as well.
That's quite the offer! We'd be happy to take whatever help you can provide.
It is my pleasure. My...GREAT pleasure. Now then, I must be off. Ta-taaaaa!
Please tell me you did not invite that mad weapon creator to stay here in the castle.
What if he creates poison smoke that paralyzes people or some other horrific thing? Don't you remember how much trouble we had last time?
Uh...yeaaaah. I probably should have thought of that, huh?
When I think about all those horrid little weapons he keeps on his person...
Well, I just hope nothing happens— but I cannot say I am confident.
Thanks for the heads-up, Cleo. I promise to keep a close eye on him.
How simply FASCINATING! Might the two of you mind telling me more of the Halidom's secrets, hmmmMMMM?
Of course! It has been speculated that the Halidom is actually a structure of almost impossible age.
We believe magic was used to prevent time-related deterioration and keep it as you see it now. Additionally...
Sha Wujing seems to be getting on with the other scholars well enough.
I'm glad. Maybe everything is going to be all right after all.
Yes, because it would be most intolerable if he started causing trouble immediately upon his arrival. *cough*
Ha ha ha...haaaaaaa.
My, what a WONDERFUL miscalculation! To think I would come across such strange technology after following Master Xuan Zang all this way!
Do any other secrets cling to this castle? I've never seen anything quite like...
Wait. ...Er, wait? Yes, wait! Hooo! I remember you! You were waiting for me when I first entered this place!
▷Sorry for what Laxi did earlier—that was way uncalled for. Are you hurt?◁
The automaton! Oh, I DO remember you!
▷Okay, Laxi. Apologize to this man.◁ Negative. I was not at fault.
Heavens above! The mechanism is arguing with ITSELF!
Laxi has two hearts in one body.
BY THE STARS AND MOONS!
I've never HEARD of such technology! Oooo, I simply MUST disassemble it at once to discern its secrets!
WHAAAAAAT?!
Er, yes? Disassembly? I simply take this little doll apart and find out what makes it ＂tick,＂ as they say in the business.
Come here, you! Let me start by removing your chest cavity so I may see the inner workings of your dual hearts!
Or perhaps I will do the same with you.
S-such strength! Such movements! I knew the machine could fight, but I had no idea it could do THIS!
Be silent. Stop talking.
Gwargh!
Sh-Sha Wujing? ...Sha Wujing!
Gahhh! Wait, what did WE do?!
Laxi, stop! Stooooop!
I hate to be one of those I-told-you-so people, but I clearly told him so.
Perhaps the problem lies not with Sha Wujing's weapons, but with the man himself. Trouble just seems to follow him like a raincloud...
Enemies detected in all directions. Probability of success: Low.
Sounds like we're surrounded. We'll have to find a way to break through their lines and escape.
Hee hee! Oh, there's no need for THAT.
Er, what do you mean?
A breakthrough point is not something to be found—it is something you CREATE!
Cleo, you see the force stationed on the hill over there, yes? Might you be so kind as to attack the crag at their feet?
Just to be clear, you want me to attack the rocks NEAR the soldiers and not the soldiers themselves?
Sha Wujing used to be a tactician back in Taiwu, Cleo. He must have a plan.
Though this be madness, I pray there is method in it. ...Yaaah!
Bwaaa ha ha! They can't aim at all!
They're clearly firing in blind desperation. We'll just wait this out and...
Wh-what?! Aaaauuugh!
The hill collapsed in a landslide, but how? My magic was not nearly powerful enough to cause such destruction.
The ground beneath the hill was unsound, and the crag was the only thing keeping it in place. Without it... Hee hee!
I KNEW you had something planned! You tacticians really are something.
HmmmmMMMMM? Tactician? Oh no, that was experience gained from my time as a public servant. Judging soil quality is the key to flood prevention, after all!
Now then! It appears the landslide has settled, which meeeeans...WE RIDE!
The force on the hill has been wiped out! The siege is broken; the lines in disarray! Let us break through the enemy and then conceal ourselves in the woods!
Don't let 'em get away, you fools! Go!
Dammit! Where are they hiding?!
Enemy forces approaching. Requesting permission to intercept.
Wait, my mechanical friend! Wait. The time must be as ripe as the most luscious peach on the tree!
Also, Laxi, you have not yet heard my secret plan! Now, when I give the signal...
...Understood. I will stand by.
They're in the woods somewhere! Flush 'em out!
Ha! I have you now!
...Wait, huh? Where'd they go? What's happening?!
Hee hee! Is that panic in your voice? Yesssss... Moooore... Give me more! Feel the doubt! Let fear run over you like a spider with a thousand hairy legs!
For a soldier with a worn-out spirit is a soldier that counts for NOTHING!
THIS is the Tiger Ambush strategy!
GAAAH! WHAT'S THAAAAT?! Phew! Just a bird. Okay, keep it together here...
Now! The time is as ripe as the most succulent apple in the bowl! NOOOOW!
Eeeeegh! They're attacking!
Stand your ground! They're off the mark!
Ah, but we are right on target.
There they are! Attaaaaack!
Should you reeeeally be looking over there when the true threat is...ABOVE YOU?!
Whu?!
GYAAAAAAAA!
What in blazes is HAPPENING?!
This? Oh, it's just a little device of mine that shoots rope arrows. I call it the Cablebow, and it creates a DELIGHTFUL place for Laxi to hide in the trees above!
Now, Laxi. ...Ravage them.
I can't believe we won so handily when we were so terribly outnumbered.
It's all thanks to Sha Wujing's plan. We owe you a great debt.
HmmmMMM? Oh, there's no need to thank me. Honestly, it was a delightful chance to show the fruits of my research.
Your...research?
Oh my, yes! You see, the moment I saw Laxi, I came up with a new military tactic.
It was an effective tactic. I would like to try it again.
Nothing pleases me more than seeing the delight in your eyes, Laxi!
And iiiiiin that case...might I trouble you for the teeniest, tiniest of favors?
Speak.
I just want to disassem— BLARGH!
Restrain yourself, sir! I swear, this man is more trouble than he's worth...
What was that?!
Hee! Judging by the color of the smoke, it seems the new weapon I set up has been tripped.
It may be a thief, but let us slink down there and see for ourselves, hmmMMM?
Oww...
Zhu Bajie? Is that you?
Aaaaaah, so YOU were the slippery weasel who slunk into my trap!
Sha Wujing! I should have known you were... Owwww...
Come on, Zhu Bajie. Let's get you inside and have Cleo patch you up.
...So you came here in search of Xuan Zang too?
You know it. Heck, I owe her so much, I got a tab as long as my arm.
The wife says repaying a debt leaves a wallet cold, but returning a favor makes a heart rich, so I wanna make it right.
Still, I didn't expect to damn near DIE in the process!
What the hell were you even THINKING, Sha Wujing! Who makes a tank with an ARM sticking out of it?
A delicious improvement, no? I received the mounting from a rokkan named Lazry.
Imagine my surprise when I saw she had attached a mechanical arm! I'd no idea a stonetech engine could be used so.
That ain't the point!
Bad enough to have a tank chase me, but then it grabbed me, stuck itself to me, and EXPLODED! If it'd been anyone else,  you'd be planning a funeral for 'em now!
Yes, I actually am rather surprised you survived. Still, you always were a rather tenacious fellow.
Yeah, well, maybe fighting against your weapons built me up.
Fighting *against*? Weren't you allies?
We used to be allies...but we also used to be enemies too.
Two peas in a pod are we! Or two greasy melons in a sack, perhaps. Anyway, it's all because we hail from the same area.
I don't follow.
To put it bluntly, Sha Wujing betrayed our hometown.
What?! Why would you do that?!
So I could develop weapons, of course! Why else does a fellow do anything?
Our home was in a poor, remote part of Taiwu—a real fetid smear of a place.
Ten or so years ago, a famine struck—and in the hour of their people's greatest need, our rulers sat about and did nothing.
Dissatisfaction toward the dynasty erupted like goo from a pore, and the people of remote regions such as ours rose up.
So it was rebellion.
Sure was. Surprise gave us the upper hand at first, but eventually the ruling class got itself together and pushed us back.
Still, we were fighting 'em tooth and nail, and might have had a chance...until Sha Wujing went and ruined it all!
And why must I remain on a sinking raft?
Developing weapons for the dynasty was DELIGHTFUL! Their funding and technology was far beyond anything I could find in the backwater regions!
See? He doesn't even feel guilty.
If I were you, Highness, I'd sleep with one eye open. Your new friend here will happily stick a knife in your back and smile while he does it.
Sure, you're all buddy-buddy now, but one of these days he'll get some crackpot idea and decide he needs to test it out on you. And that's when—
AAAAAAAH!
That was Luca!
Hee hee hee!
Don't tell me YOU'RE responsible for this, you half-mad dastard!
Dear me, it sounds like one of your castle-mates has found another of my weapons. Terrible shame if so, because we're surely too late to help.
ENOUGH! This time, you PAY!
He can pay later, Zhu Bajie! Right now, we need to see what happened!
Are you okay, Luca? Talk to me.
HELP MEEEE! I DON'T WANNA DIEEE!
You're not going to die, Luca! You're just... tangled up in a bunch of ropes?
I had Sha Wujing modify his Cablebow into a trap that would capture anyone who attempted to pilfer food from the kitchen.
Now I can concentrate on my cooking. Thank you very much, by the way.
HmmmMMM? Oh, no need to thank me. I was happy to research a weapon that allowed me to capture instead of kill!
You really scared the crap outta everybody with that stunt, you know?
You seem to think I will betray anyone at the drop of a hat, but I assure you, I would never do so without a very good reason.
Though if I DO find a reason... Hee hee!
I have returned. And it seems...
Xuan Zang!
*sigh* I can't believe the two of you followed me all the way here.
But of course! It is our most earnest wish to accompany you, Master Xuan Zang!
I'll follow you to the ends of the earth or  the middle of an enemy camp to repay everything I owe you!
While I...appreciate the sentiment, I have no intentions of allowing outsiders to accompany me.
I suggest you give up and accept it. Now if you'll pardon me?
X-Xuan Zang?!
Aw, c'mon! She oughta let you join up! A lively trip is way more fun, yeah?
Heavens above and worms below! You're Qilin! Might you also have a relic with you, perchance?
Huh? You're into relics? Oh man, that is a piece of good news!
I got relics comin' out the... Well, I got a whole lotta relics. C'mon up to my room, and I'll show ya my wares!
OOOOOOO! What a dollop of delight this will prove to be!
...I see. So your goal is to use relics to give people a more convenient life?
Yep. I've got all these useful dealies here, so it'd be a waste not to use 'em!
Yes! YEEEES! You are absolutely right! It is exactly as you say!
I myself have always thought the same! Only a fool would seal relics away willy- nilly simply because they are ＂dangerous＂ or ＂deadly＂ or ＂cause terrible maiming.＂
The generations march onward BECAUSE we develop and research technology!
See, you get it! Though I mostly love it 'cause I get to try out all sorts of stuff.
Yeah, I like you, man. You get me.
My skin crawls with delight, milady!
(What a stroke of good luck to meet such an understanding member of the Qilin!)
(It genuinely makes me consider switching from Master Xuan Zang's side... Hee hee!)
Hey, so what kinda relic do you want to check out first? I got tons.
A most earth-shattering one! A relic that oozes with power!
Earth-shattering, eh? Hmm...
Yes! In fact, I would be delighted to see a phenomenon that surpasses all human comprehension!
Heh. So you REALLY wanna go over the top, eh? In that caaaaase...
Behold the Hao Pu Hu!
There's a relic called the Yong Run Hu that creates an endless amount of water, but this one takes that ability and cranks it up to eleven!
It spurts out MASSIVE amounts of water! We're talking waterfalls!
All that from such a small pot? My word! What sort of mechanism powers it?
I must disassemble it and... No, but that would only destroy the precious relic.
Hee hee! You're a funny guy, pal! I like you even more now!
All right, let's go outside and see all the crazy stuff the Hao Pu Hu can do!
Excitement leaks out of my every nook and cranny, milady!
Hee hee! Yeah, I'm pretty great, all right. Now let's do this thing!
O power universal of the Qilin, be bound by my solemn decree. Billowing falls! Torrent of the river! Invoke your gift strong and swift!
By the moon and sun! This is like the great falls of Taiwu!
What a truly awesome amount of water! In the blink of an eye, everything around us is...squishy...and damp...and flooded?
Waaaaaagh!
The water isn't in the castle yet, so I think we're still okay.
Huh? What happened to you two? And why are you both so wet?!
Oh, nothing! Just fiddling around with a relic in the ol' courtyard! La de dum de do...
The only good thing about this situation is that you both still draw breath.
Let me guess, Jiang Ziya: You got carried away with a relic and failed to seal it.
Oh man, I really screwed up this time.
Fascinating! So even a member of the great Qilin can make such a blunder?
(I never thought to meet a careless member of their tribe... It's a lucky thing indeed that I did not switch allegiances!)
Well, this is certainly quite the problem you two created. The courtyard is a lake, and I've no idea how to reach the relic.
I have a plan.
You do?!
We can stop the relic if we get close to it, yes? In that case, all we need are my wits and Zhu Bajie's hulking strength!
Hmm...
Xuan Zang? Why the hesitation?
I do not wish to involve non-sealer outsiders in an incident caused by a relic.
Jiang Ziya and I will solve this alone.
Okay, that doesn't make ANY sense.
I mean, yeah, we're not sealers— but we're also not outsiders.
Explain this, if you would.
We're all allies in this castle.
And this is putting all our allies in danger. So if we don't save 'em, it's the same as if we never fulfilled our duty.
One can always count on Zhu Bajie to spew forth about honor and duty and... Well, all the rest of that.
My reasons are simpler: We have the knowledge and technology to solve the problem, therefore we should.
And if we also save lives as a result, I suppose that's all right.
You two...
It couldn't hurt to get their help, right? We're all on the same page here.
You...are correct.
I will accept your help—both of you.
Leave it to us!
Yaaaah!
Whoa! The water's flooding outside through that hole he made in the wall!
Water will always flow from high places to lower places. And as this courtyard is the lowest spot in the castle, we need only to make a hole, aaaand...
Hah! This is great stuff! It's like unclogging a bath!
Now, Jiang Ziya! Stop the relic!
Gotcha! O power universal of the Qilin, be bound by my solemn decree. Billowing falls! Torrent of the river! May your exertions be suppressed!
We should be all right now. Thank you, both of you.
And if I may ask one more thing, would you continue lending me your combined strength?
I could use fellow travelers like you on my quest to seal the relics.
OF COURSE!
O power universal of the Qilin, be bound by my solemn decree. Sky-burning flash! Lightning caller! May your exertions be suppressed!
Whoa! The thunder cloud vanished! Guess that's it then, yeah?
Yes, and I appreciate your help fending off fiends while I performed my work.
Hey, that's what we're here for!
What manner of relic was it this time? I would be MOST delighted to witness it with my own eyes!
Very well—but ONLY with your eyes! Are we perfectly clear on this?
This relic... It is... It is so... I MUST DISASSEMBLE IT!
All right, that's it. I'm sealing it away.
Noooooo!
Honestly, how many times do we have to go over this?
Only sealers should be handling relics. And though you are my travel companions, this prescript still applies to you.
Now, let us return to the Halidom. I hope you will join me on my next quest.
You bet! It's my dream in life to repay my debt to you, after all!
And what of me, hmmmmMMMM? Am I to be left in some tedious limbo?
Hmph! In that case, it seems I have no other alternative...
...Wait, you wanna be MY apprentice?! But you're Xuan Zang's apprentice! Or, uh...her something, at least.
I have had an epiphany: If I am to gaze upward from the bunions of a master, she must be in every way my superior!
So it MUST be you, Master Jiang Ziya! For you are the finest sealer in the world!
Well, I AM sort of a genius...
(Hee hee! How easy it is to control someone who falls for base flattery!)
(And while I have a feeling there will be many failures because of that, one cannot make an omelet without breaking the pale, sticky yolks of a few eggs...)
All right, you talked me into it. I'll be your master!
My eyeballs quiver in anticipation! Please teach me the secrets of the relics!
...Oh, and let's keep this relationship a secret from Xuan Zang, hmmMMM?
Huh? Why's that?
Errrr...it is for her own sake.
After all, she might be hurt to learn I came to study under your superior skill!
Heck YEAH, she'd be upset about that! I basically yoinked you right out from under her nose, after all.
All right, we'll keep this all on the DL.
...Heeeeeeeek! I'm going to diiiiie!
I never imagined that my training to control relics would be so...so SEVERE!
M-mercy, master! Pray have mercy on me!
Nope! Now shut your trap and keep concentrating.
Th-this is madness... If I slip, I will fall into a pit of lava!
Oh, it's fiiiine! The relic'll totally save ya if you fall.
And yet, has it not been slowly chipping away at my footing because you are FAILING to control it?!
Huh. I noticed he'd been absent of late, but never considered he might have taken up as another's apprentice.
You wanna head over there and give him the business?
No. He is Jiang Ziya's apprentice now, which means we have no business of which to speak.
And though she seems irresponsible, she has gone through intense training. She will take no half measures, this one.
This is an excellent opportunity for him to be tempered and honed... Oh ho...
You say stuff with a straight face that other folks freak out at. You know that, right?
Well, hang in there, Sha Wujing. We're rooting for you.
Aaaaaaugh! I'm going to fall! For real, this time!
N-no... I cannot! I cannot die here!
For if I pass this test, I can use all of the relics however I WAAAAAAANT!
